name: Waiting for Damien
description:
Made in 11 hours for UCSB Game Dev Club's Winter 2021 Game Jam. Programming by Blake, writing by Callie, and art by Kean.

Callie: https://vainfire.itch.io/

Kean: https://snektech.itch.io/

Controls: Enter/Space to advance dialogue, Mouse to click buttons. Esc to quit.

Browser version likely to contain bugs (not built for browser). If it seems unresponsive, try clicking in the game to "focus" it. If you encounter any errors, using Chrome or Firefox seems to have the best results. If it still does not work, please use a downloaded version.
